Master Answer:
Health care providers refer to Part 1 of the BCCDC Immunization Manual - Immunization Schedules when developing a schedule for healthy children and adolescents 7 to 17 years of age (inclusive) who have never been immunized.  This section lists the recommended vaccines and scheduling guidelines for this age group. 
Your immunizing health care provider can tell you what the recommended schedule is for your child based on your child's age and other factors. 
- Immunization Nurse
Master Question: Is there an alternate vaccine schedule for children 7 years old and up who have never been immunized?
